articles.title: French coronavirus expert REJECTS second wave fears branding warnings a 'fantasy' - Express.co.uk
articles.description: A LEADING health expert has dismissed fears France could be hit by a 'second wave' of COVID-19 infections as officials unveiled plans to relax some of the country's strict lockdown measures.
